name: 周凤凰
introduction: Phoenix Chou was born in Hong Kong and moved to USA (Mussel Shoals, Alabama), when she was six years old. She lived and traveled all over the world before moving to Los Angeles, where she studied fine art and environmental design at the Art Center in Pasadena. She began modeling and has been in campaigns for Tommy Hilfiger, Guess, Revlon and H&M. Recently, she landed a lead part in the fantasy epic "Deva Shard," filmed in Hong Kong. She is currently working with Hong Kong directors Wong Jing and Wong Kar Wai.
